title: Man’s Hell - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Game   Female Protagonist   Transported into a Game World   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Yunsul   윤슬
description:
I entered the novel I wrote.

Novel instincts.

Well, it’s okay. It was possible.

It is an era of regression and dimensional shifting, but what should I do?

It was a successful intent because I entered a character with a nice body shape, good personality, and a beautiful woman.

By the way, this novel is a reverse harem, and the genre is BL.

BOY’S LOVE.

Oh, why did I come into the flower garden but can’t even have it!

Every man in this novel is gay.

This world is over!>
